thread.title: Deep Offshore Technology Int. Conference Announces Pemex Keynote Speaker
thread.title_full: Deep Offshore Technology Int. Conference Announces Pemex Keynote Speaker - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Deep Offshore Technology Int. Conference Announces Pemex Keynote Speaker
text:
PennWell Corporation
Dr. Pedro Silva-Lopez will discuss Gulf of Mexico outlook at Houston-based conference
WOODLANDS, Texas , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Energy policy reform in Mexico has captured global interest as the world waits to see how these changes will affect the oil and gas industry. Deep Offshore Technology International Conference and Exhibition (DOT) will spotlight these issues and more, with Pemex's Chief Technology Officer exclusively presenting as the keynote speaker.
"The eyes of the oil and gas industry are on Mexico as they implement sweeping reforms to energy policy and open production to new operators," said David Paganie , Chief Editor of Offshore magazine and International Conference Director of PennWell's Offshore Group. "These changes are at the forefront of the agenda for DOT, and Pemex's Dr. Pedro Silva-Lopez is the ideal speaker to open the conference."
Dr. Pedro Silva-Lopez will help kick off DOT by speaking to the ongoing energy reforms in Mexico and what he sees in store for the future of deepwater development. Pulling from his experience, he will share insights on the important opportunities that are now available for new players and how Pemex is transforming to face this new market.
Registration for the conference is still open. For more information about the DOT program or to register, please visit the website or connect with the show on Facebook , Twitter and LinkedIn with #DOTIntl . Media passes are available for press.
Click to Tweet
About DOT
The Deep Offshore Technology International Conference and Exhibition (DOT) is a three-day oil and gas industry event dedicated to the emerging trends and daily practices of deepwater exploration and development. Owned and produced by PennWell Corporation, DOT is presented by Offshore magazine and hosted by operating companies. It features presentations, panel discussions, a comprehensive technical program and interactive exhibits focused on the unique needs of deep and ultra-deepwater.
About PennWell Corporation
PennWell Corporation is a privately held business-to-business media and information company that provides quality content and integrated marketing solutions for more than a dozen business sectors, including oil and gas. PennWell publishes over 130 print and online magazines and newsletters, conducts 60 conferences and exhibitions on six continents, and has an extensive offering of books, maps, websites, research and database services.
